articles.content: Former India batsman Nari Contractor suffered a head fracture after being hit by a Charlie Griffith bouncer on the 1962 tour of the Caribbean. Now, 60 years later, the metal plate inserted in the hea… [+3368 chars]

articles.title: Mignon du Preez announces retirement from ODIs and Tests - ESPNcricinfo
